titleStmt.title: England's alarum, being an account of God's most considerable dispensations of mercy and judgement toward these kingdoms for fourteen years last past and also of the several sorts of sins and sinners therein ... with an earnest call to speedy humiliation, supplication, and reformation ...
titleStmt.author: Dunton, John, 1659-1733.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
Attributed to John Dunton. cf. NUC pre-1956.
